1.text: And working together, we also beseech, lest also ye receive the grace of God in vain.

2.text: (For he says, In an acceptable time I listened to thee, and in the day of salvation have I run to succor thee: behold, now the acceptable time; behold; now the day of salvation.)

3.text: Giving no offence in any thing, that the service be not blamed:

4.text: But in every thing recommending ourselves as servants of God, in much patience, in pressures, in necessities, in extremities,

5.text: In blows, in imprisonments, in disorders, in fatigues, in watchings, in fastings;

6.text: In purity, in knowledge, in long suffering, in kindness, in the Holy Spirit, in love unfeigned.

7.text: In the word of truth, in the power of God, through the weapons of justice of the right hands and the left,

8.text: Through glory and ignominy, through slander and applause: as erring, and true;

9.text: As being ignorant, and knowing; as dying, and, behold, we live; as being disciplined, and not killed;

10.text: As being grieved, and always rejoicing; as poor, and making many rich; as having nothing, and possessing all things.

11.text: Our month stands open to you, O Corinthians, our heart has been enlarged.

12.text: Ye are not contracted in us, but ye are contracted in your bowels.

13.text: And for the same recompense, (I speak as to children,) be ye yourselves also enlarged.

14.text: Be not unequally yoked together with the unbelieving: for what participation to justice and iniquity and what communion to light with darkness?

15.text: And what conformity to Christ with Belial? and what part to the believing with the unbelieving?

16.text: And what agreement to the temple of God with images? for ye are the temple of the living God; as God said, That I will dwell in them, and will go round about; and will be their God, and they shall be a people to me.

17.text: Therefore come out from the midst of them, and be separated, says the Lord, and touch not the unclean; and I will receive you.

18.text: And I will be to you for a Father, and ye shall be to me for sons and daughters, says the Lord Almighty.
